Description:
Researching the product to understand how best to photograph it.
Sourcing props that will enhance the product.
Finding models if necessary.
Editing images to match the client's brand.
Staying up to date with the latest image editing software.Skills
Skills:
Proficiency in Photoshop.
Previous experience as a photographer (with a portfolio).
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to form new concepts for each product shoot.
Good time management skills at a shoot.
